page.title: 06MY FAMILY
page.content: I HAVE A BROTHER ANDREW AND A SISTER JOANNE. MY BROTHER IS TAKING HIS EXAMS THIS YEAR. JOANNE WATCHES TELEVISION IN HER SPARE TIME. MY DAD IS A MECHANIC ON CARS AND HE ONLY HAS A DAY OFF ON SUNDAYS. MY MUM STAYS IN THE HOUSE BUT ON FRIDAYS SHE GOES SHOPPING AND ON TUESDAYS SHE GOES TO MY NANA'S AND MY NANA BUYS US SOME SWEETS AND A TOY. WHEN WE ARE AT SCHOOL ON A SUNNY DAY MY MUM IS OUT SUNBATHING IN THE BACK GARDEN AND WHEN MY DAD COMES IN HE SAYS "WHAT HAVE YOU BEEN DOING ALL DAY?" SOMETIMES I PLAY WITH ALISON AND WE PLAY ROUNDERS OR ONE MAN STAND. SO WHEN I GO IN I HAVE A DRINK AND A BICKY AND GO TO BED. THE NEXT MORNING OUR HOME LIFE STARTS ALL OVER AGAIN. BY KYRA KNIGHT.
